lead_paragraph:
I Touched All your Stuff focuses on Chris Kirk, an American IT technician who moved to Colombia after reading about Pablo Escobar’s hippos in a magazine.

On his first day in Bogota, Chris met a mysterious Japanese-Colombian woman named "V," and t
